mapper.select: select id id, key_word keyWord, order_num orderNum, rate rate, b_c_purchase_num bcPurchaseNum, task_id taskId from task_key_word_detail where task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: insert into task_additional_product_detail(key_word, order_num , rate , b_c_purchase_num , task_id) values(#{keyWord},#{orderNum},#{rate},#{bcPurchaseNum}, #{taskId})
